text: Scotlandia is an extinct genus of conodonts in the family Prioniodinidae. == References == * Structure and evolution of Ordovician conodont apparatuses. Christopher R Barnes, David J. Kennedy, Alexander D. McCracken and Glen A. Tarrant, Lethaia, October 2007, volume 12, issue 2, pages 125–151, == External links == Category:Prioniodinida genera Category:Ordovician conodonts
title: Scotlandia (conodont)
